mapper.update: update tbl_activity_remark set noteContent = #{noteContent},editTime = #{editTime}, editBy = #{editBy},editFlag = #{editFlag} where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_activity_remark( id, noteContent, createTime, createBy, editFlag, activityId) values(#{id},#{noteContent},#{createTime},#{createBy},#{editFlag},#{activityId})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_activity_remark where activityId = #{id} order by createTime
